means: 茅屋，劳动者的合住小屋

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(B) ... bothie 茅屋 bothy 茅屋 botryoid 葡萄状的.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: obscurely related to Irish and Scottish Gaelic both, bothan, and perhaps to booth

auth_sentence.content: Eventually we came to the lake and a walker's bothy - a free open house for travellers to stay.

auth_sentence.content: But "we'll of course try to push it to the customer," says Mr. Bothy.
